ShowDragDistance.enable-l: Shows the distance you're moving your token while dragging, similar to holding the CTRL key and dragging on the canvas.
ShowDragDistance.showPath-l: Shows path on drag as default, press ALT to hide it. If disabled, path is hidden and ALT shows it.
ShowDragDistance.rangeFinder-l: Enable holding ALT key to show range from selected token on mouse move.
